Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item has been meticulously crafted to meet your highest expectations and is worth every penny of its $8,000 value. I understand the importance of getting the right price for such an investment, so I am offering it to you for $7,500. This is an opportunity to secure a high-quality product at a competitive price. I look forward to your consideration and hope to hear from you soon. Thank you for your time and interest. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $7,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $7,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $8,000
